content: Hello, does anyone know how to set up email notifications for a certain stream? I mean by that if someone sends a new message for one particular stream I would get an email notification about it but not from every stream I've subscribed. I've tried to set up from stream settings 'Receive desktop notifications' and 'Receive audible notifications' but not working so far. Do I need to set up more from general settings -> Notifications?

I don't think Zulip has a way to get e-mail notifications for every message in a specific stream (and I can see why; do other chat tools have a feature like this?). You can sign up for notifications on a stream, which will include desktop notifications -- but not per-message emails (unless @Tim Abbott says otherwise).

Not yet, but there's an open PR to add this, it'll probably be a feature available sometime soonish (though it's a PR I'm likely to be needed to review and I'm currently on leave taking care of our 9-day-old daughter!).
